trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks and attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kuo-toa makes two Bone Whip attacks.

action.name: Bone Whip
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Lightning damage, and the target can't make {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks} until the start of the kuo-toa's next turn.
